name: 陳立衡
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意
Forward and inverse kinematics of linkages.
Instantaneous kinematics of planar linkages
Static analysis of planar linkages.
Dynamic analysis of planar linkages.
Cam design.
schedule:
1. Course description and syllabus
2. Introduction of mechanisms and degrees of freedom
3. Forward and inverse kinematics of linkages
4. Graphical method of velocity and acceleration analysis of linkages
5. Reversible geometric constraint programming
6. Instant center review
7. Curvature theory
8. Euler-Savary Equation, Bobillier's construction, Inflection circle, Bressee circle.
9. Static analysis of linkages
10. Dynamic analysis of linkages
11. Midterm exam
12. Introduction of cam
13. Instant center method
14. Envelope method
15. Motion program of cam
16. Pressure angle and curvature analysis
17. Project presentation
18. Final exam
materials:
Textbook: Notes and handouts
Suggested References: Waldron, K. J., Kinzel, G. L., & Agrawal, S. K. (2016). Kinematics, dynamics, and design of machinery, 3rd edition. John Wiley & Sons.
